sentences.en: " Grandpa's taken ill, " Xiao Li told me breathlessly.
sentences.cn: 小莉气喘嘘嘘地告诉我, “ 爷爷有病了. ”

sentences.en: Grandpa has been out of circulation after the stroke.
sentences.cn: 在中风之后,祖父已经不再应酬.

sentences.en: Grandpa lies comatose on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 爷爷躺在沙发上，睡得很沉。

sentences.en: Grandpa told the children the tales of his childhood.
sentences.cn: 爷爷给孩子们讲他童年的故事.

sentences.en: Grandpa was not yet back from the war.
sentences.cn: 爷爷那时还没从战场归来。
爷爷愈来愈丢三落四了.

sentences.en: I'd really like to pick up Grandpa at the railroad station.
sentences.cn: 我真想去火车站接爷爷.

sentences.en: I'm Grandpa's daughter - in - law , but I feel like a Stewart.
sentences.cn: 我是爷爷的 儿媳妇, 但我觉得我是Stewart家 的一员.

sentences.en: Right from the start I was on Grandpa's side.
Tell Grandpa the good news so that he can share our joy.
sentences.cn: 快把这消息告诉你爷爷,叫他老人家也高兴高兴.

sentences.en: The " d " in " grandpa " has been lost by assimilation to " p ".
sentences.cn: " grandpa " 中的 " d " 因受 " p " 的同化而不发音.

sentences.en: The mailman just dropped some mail in our box, Grandpa.
sentences.cn: 邮差刚刚塞进一些信件在我们的信箱, 爷爷.

sentences.en: Tom's grandpa decided to take Tom to the forest.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的爷爷决定带汤姆到森林里去.

sentences.en: We fell about at Grandpa's funny story.
sentences.cn: 听了爷爷讲的滑稽故事,我们忍不住大笑.

sentences.en: When Grandpa misses me he'll come round fast enough.
sentences.cn: 等到祖父失去了我,他会很快清醒过来的.
